item.title: Our Growing Space
item.description: Want to give a quick introduction to the growing space that we are working with. My partner Cat and I rent an apartment in Somerville, Massachusetts. We live with two cats and grow most of our plants in our spare room that we only let the cats in if we are around (because they love munching on the plants). Our spare room has a small south-facing window that directly faces another building.

item.title: Furb-Sust
item.description: In August 2018 I embarked on a project focused on developing skills for refurbishing items and improving my personal sustainability practices to reduce my and my community’s wastefulness. I designed this activity around ideas in Jane Mcgonigal’s Superbetter. The premise is that a game-ful mindset helps people find meaning, achieve their goals, be happier, and be better contributors to their community.
